entries.notes:
-Email review and associated training.
-Discussion of customer introduction methods.
-Defined key contacts for customer outreach.
-ADFF event planning/review session.
entries.privateNotes: Went through all emails and did training associated with such emails. Also discussed method and who to call for customer introductions. Also discussed ADFF and the weekend plans. Went over the basics of what I would say to clients and what to say and do for ADFF.

entries.notes:
-Acctivate training with Owen and Fahd
-Compiled and assisted Fahd with Blueview email correspondance
entries.privateNotes: Went over basics of setting up new users, permissions etc. Also showed a few reports specifically around sales and numbers. Sent links to Acctivate help knowledge base and answered any other questions they had. Also helped with Blueview ongoing po issues.

entries.notes: -Client transition communications and handover coordination including email summary (Nov 5th, 6th and 7th)
entries.privateNotes:
1:05-1:30pm - Nov 5th - Jim Titan - Jim was surprised but happy for me and didn't seem concerned. Mentioned Paul Savage to contact Jordan from Titan
2:45-3:15-3:55pm - Nov 5th - Mike Bellsmith - Chatted with Mike and hes not concerned about future ongoing with RJCross and happy for me. Meeting setup for second week of Dec.
3:55-4:25pm - Nov 5th - Carson Keen - Not worried about the future, did mention that RJCross is an ongoing and big part of RJCross going forward. He told the business partners and seems everything is fine no concerns. They are doing year end but will setup proper intros in the coming weeks.
10:30-11am - Nov 6th - Ryan Peever - Gescan, happy for me. Not concerned about the future.
11-11:20am - Nov 6th - Dan Haig - Gescan, didn't show any real signs of anything to be concerned. He will worry more about if pricing changes, contract changes etc. Have a meeting setup for Nov 27th.
11:20-11:50am - Nov 6th - Ian Newbury - Gescan quotes - Happy for me, mentioned not much changes he still deals with Kevin and Paul.
12:15-12:35pm - Nov 6th - Mike Duarte - Gescan Quotes - Happy for me, pretty much same thing as Ian. Paul Savage to setup meeting with both.
3-3:30pm - Nov 6th - Sam Or - Wow lighting - Distributor sales. Happy for me and seems to have no concerns going forward.
3:50-4:20pm - Nov 6th - Christo - Wesco - Says he will still use RJCross going forward. its his go to brand and thats not changing. Seems to have no concerns. I did mention they are aware of that keldon project and they will continue to take care of it.
11:10-12pm - Nov 7th - Kandy - Design lighting - Only concerned if we sold to a competitor which I said we did not. Paul Savavge to setup meeting.
12:10-12:30pm - Nov 7th - Wyll - Wow lighting - Excited for RJCross future and setting up email call/correspondence in coming weeks.
also sent summary email, sent emails to all people so they have fahd contact and even did an yvonne training email gescan about how to respond.

entries.notes: -ADFF opening night party and Fahd intro
entries.privateNotes: Introduced as new CEO and Im just stepping back. Did not mention Im selling and kept it pretty light.
